name: Asquared
description:
Use WASD to move

Use SPACE or LEFTSHIFT to dodge

Use TAB to open inventory

The circles have invaded the lands of the polygons. The leaders of the polygons were all defeated, and despair took over the polygons. Yet there still exists hope, among the polygons as one's number of points increases their power increases, but a mere square decided to struggle against the circles.

Try to defeat the circles in this roguelike game with 3 levels, 5 bosses and 2 endings.

Made by a single developed with little time
